channel.title: Doom Scape V4.20
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=13pt]Doom Scape V4.20 is finally here!!! [img]http://s27.postimg.org/kbr3p9ayb/Lair_of_the_dragons.png[/img]
Server No Longer Down!! Updated Early No More MAINT.
Download client here http://www.filedropper.com/doomscapev420_1
Doom Scape Has a Website!. http://www.dev.archaicguru.ca/
SCREENSHOTS UP SOON!!!!
So far Just building a nice clean doped up website for the server, more focusing on voteing system because its one of a kind.. ~ clean ~ ~ server very reliant never down ~ ~ Max cape added ~ ~ Completionist cape ~ ~ Skills go to 126 ~ ~ Summoning ~ ~ Rune essence mine, and teleport ~ ~ Quick firemaking cube (click on it, and it takes all your logs and converts them to experience) ~ ~ New bows available from the vote shop ~ [/size][/u][/b][/center]
